text: The Office of Strategic Services (OSS) was a wartime intelligence agency of the United States during World War II. Clancey, Patrick. Office of Strategic Services (OSS) organization and functions. HyperWar. Retrieved Nov 10, 2016. [https://www.ibiblio.org/hyperwar/USG/JCS/OSS/OSS-Functions/index.html ] It was the predecessor of the modern Central Intelligence Agency (CIA). == References == Category:Espionage
title: Office of Strategic Services
